column4: Hey can someone help me!!!! : I have a presentation to give and I want to use the open office version of powerpoint (since I only run linux on my computer) and I was wondering what I am going to need to do to have it be able to be on the projection screen... This is for my TechComm class of U of M
any chance you can get access to the projector ahead of time?  you'll probably want to set it up as a monitor in xorg.conf
I have an hour and I don't shit about how to edit xorg.conf
yeah, talk to dyrne, I'm just going to be guessing, he sounds like he's got some experience at least
